entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
